metadata.title: CVE-2023-1710 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A sensitive information disclosure vulnerability in GitLab affecting allversions from 15.0 prior to 15.8.5, 15.9 prior to 15.9.4 and 15.10 prior to15.10.1 allows an attacker to view the count of internal notes for a givenissue.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
